item.title: Setting up Google Analytics on hugo-apéro
item.description: TL;DR In this blog, I summarize the steps necessary to set up Google Analytics on a Hugo-Apéro website. Introduction Google Analytics is a useful tool for measuring and understanding engagement with your personal website. In my experience, it is probably the most painless method for accessing detailed tracking data for a Hugo site. Helpfully, most Hugo themes come with it pre-installed through an internal template. In this blog, I’ll outline the two steps necessary to configure Google Analytics for your Hugo-Apéro website:
